properties.entry: select TITLE,CONTENT from fs_message_info where USERTO = '${userid}' and STATE = '1' and rownum<=5 order by OPTIME desc
select count(1) from fs_message_info where USERTO = '${userid}' and STATE = '1'
select opid, userfrom, userfromname, userto, usertoname, title, content, optime, sysmessage, emailmessage, smsmessage, deloper, deltime, state, accessory, linkurl, sjbh, ywlx from FS_MESSAGE_INFO
